{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Yae Publishing House|It|Yae Publishing House}} is referred to as a giant of the [[Inazuma]] publishing industry. It periodically holds a competition called "This Novel Is Amazing!" and is renowned throughout [[Teyvat]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|This Novel Is Amazing!}}</ref> Its boss and founder is [[Yae Miko]], the chief priestess of the [[Grand Narukami Shrine (Faction)|Grand Narukami Shrine]].<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Inagi Hotomi}}</ref></p>

<p>Due to the popularity of ''[[A Legend of Sword]]'' in Inazuma and [[Fontaine]], Yae Publishing House has attempted to contract [[Albedo]]'s artistic talents for their own novels.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Albedo|About Xingqiu}}</ref></p>}}

==Trivia==
* "This Novel Is Amazing!" is a reference to the Japanese {{w|light novel}} writing competition called ''{{w|Kono Light Novel ga Sugoi!}}'' {{Lang|ja=このライトノベルがすごい！|ja_rm=Kono Raito Noberu ga Sugoi!|ja_tl=This Light Novel Is Amazing!}}, in which winners of the competition have received anime adaptions that have become some of the most popular anime in the history of Japanese animation.
** In the Chinese language version of the game, the quest and competition "This Novel Is Amazing!" are named identically to the Chinese name of the Japanese writing competition {{Lang|zh=这本轻小说真厉害！|zh_rm=Zhèběn Qīngxiǎoshuō Zhēn Lìhài!}}.
* The Yae Publishing House was established no more than 500 years ago.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|To Traverse the Mortal Plane|q=Back when I decided to isolate myself in the Plane of Euthymia, there was no Yae Publishing House, [...]}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Omnipresent God}}</ref>
* It takes two weeks for a serialized novel to get to [[Natlan]] and a year for chapters to be released as a single volume.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Citlali}}</ref>
* The following books are known to be published by Yae Publishing House:
** Some are registered in the [[Archive]]:
*** [[A Legend of Sword]], written by [[Zhenyu]] and illustrated by [[Calx]]
*** [[Legend of the Shattered Halberd]], written by [[Mr. Nine]]
** Others can only be obtained as quest items:
*** [[The Sage Aetolia Will Die Tomorrow]]
*** [[Literature Club]]
*** [[The Honest Cat's Little Lie]]
*** [[Onibudou]]
*** [[First Apprentice of Guhua]]<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Kuroda}}</ref>
*** [[King of Invokations (Book)|King of Invokations]]<ref>{{Ref/Quest|King of Invokations}}</ref>
** Some are only mentioned and cannot be obtained by the player:
*** ''Teyvat Art of War''<ref>{{Ref/VO|Sangonomiya Kokomi|Anything To Share: Periodicals}}</ref>
*** ''The Good Thing About Being Reincarnated as a Hilichurl Is That I Only Need to Eat Sunsettias to Become Stronger''<ref name="ei story quest tour">{{Ref/Quest|To Traverse the Mortal Plane}}</ref>
*** ''Life Made Me a Fighter When I Just Want to Be a Writer''<ref name="ei story quest tour" />
*** ''The Chaotic Epic That Is the Tale of My Youthful Love Life''<ref name="ei story quest tour" />
*** ''Legend of the Wind Knight''<ref name="2022-04-01">Event: [[Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens/2022-04-01|Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens]]</ref><ref name="2022-11-16">Event: [[Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens/2022-11-16|Outside the Canvas, Inside the Lens: Greenery Chapter]]</ref>
*** ''The Rockeater''<ref name="2022-04-01" /><ref name="2022-11-16" />
*** ''Mirage Warriors'', originally written by Nakajima Jun and continued by two other authors up to 200 years ago <ref>{{Ref/VO|Citlali|About Citlali: Mirage Warriors}}</ref>
